title: Fight back by any means necessary

replies.msg:
HK demands some kind of police accountability, which is sadly completely lacking right now.

Nowadays, HK police act like rabid dogs, some kind of angry pissed-off animals, just charging forward, yelling, pointing their teargas gun, or even pistol indiscriminately at people.
I was no longer confident that the police weren’t just going to randomly shoot at people.

People are not scared of the protestors despite the police portraying them as unlawful, hooligan.
People really get scared is when the police show up. We can see most of the violence begins when the police arrived. Protests despite supposedly being illegal, despite being unauthorised, were very orderly and peaceful.

However, police are using the most extreme form of violence to suppress straightforwardly on people’s legally guaranteed rights under the basic law.

I certainly feel that I’m not only support the protests, I also support really any measure that protestors use at this point to push back against a violent and repressive regime. Whatever happens its important for people to continue to FIGHT BACK by any means necessary.
